title.rendered: The PAD Hotel / Hostel – Silverthorne, Colorado

content.rendered:
Voted 2022 Best Lodging In Summit County, Colorado!

STAY. INDEPENDENT. TOGETHER.

BOOK YOUR VISIT WITH US

BOOK YOUR VISIT

WE ARE FOR THE
MODERN TRAVELER

Our affordable, yet high-amenity, lodging in beautiful Summit County, Colorado allows our guests to prioritize experience, adventure and to focus their spending on activities and experiences in the Rocky Mountains and our community.

As Silverthorne’s first boutique hotel/hostel, we are centrally-located along the Blue River, in the heart of Colorado ski country.

Learn More

WE ARE FOR THE MODERN TRAVELER

Our affordable, yet high-amenity, lodging in beautiful Summit County, Colorado allows our guests to prioritize experience, adventure and to focus their spending on activities and experiences in the Rocky Mountains and our community.

As Silverthorne’s first boutique hotel/hostel, we are centrally-located along the Blue River, in the heart of Colorado ski country.

Learn More

A VARIETY OF ROOMS

We took our shared experiences traveling around the world to create the most diverse lodging options under one roof. Whether you’re a seasoned hostelier or are looking for something more traditional, we’ve got options to satisfy every type of traveler.
See Rooms

A VARIETY OF ROOMS

We took our shared experiences traveling around the world to create the most diverse lodging options under one roof. Whether you’re a seasoned hostelier or are looking for something more traditional, we’ve got options to satisfy every type of traveler.
See Rooms

EAT + DRINK

Whether you need a quick fuel up or are settling in for the day, look no further than A-BAR at The Pad. We have created a community-forward space that is as comfortable for our guests as it is inviting for the locals. Grab some quick snacks for a day of adventure, celebrate a stellar day in the mountains, enjoy pre-dinner drinks, or simply belly-up for great conversation.
A-BAR Menu

Open at 3:00 pm Mon – Thurs
Open at Noon Fri – Sun

Learn More

Only Charcuterie Board Available
Colorado-sourced artisan meats, cheeses, dips, spreads, fruits, nuts, veggies, and crackers

EAT + DRINK

Whether you need a quick fuel up or are settling in for the day, look no further than A-BAR at The Pad. We have created a community-forward space that is as comfortable for our guests as it is inviting for the locals. Grab some quick snacks for a day of adventure, celebrate a stellar day in the mountains, enjoy pre-dinner drinks, or simply belly-up for great conversation.
A-BAR Menu

Open at 3:00 pm Mon – Thurs
Open at Noon Fri – Sun

Learn More

Only Charcuterie Board Available
Colorado-sourced artisan meats, cheeses, dips, spreads, fruits, nuts, veggies, and crackers

GROUPS AND EVENTS

We consider group booking anything more than 10 humans. The form below will give us the initial information we need to best serve you, and someone from our team will be in contact within 48 hours.

    I agree to terms and conditions set forth in The Pad's privacy policy.

    GROUPS AND EVENTS

    The form below will give us the initial information we need to best serve you, and someone from our team will be in contact within 48 hours.

      I agree to terms and conditions set forth in The Pad's privacy policy.

      Need an afternoon pick-me-up? Thursday Throwdowns are here for you!

      Come get some @plucknorrisband action this afternoon for happy hour music from 4:30-7PM tonight in A-BAR.

      A-BAR features 26 taps of local beer, wine and kombucha + hand-crafted cocktails and an extensive non-alcoholic menu so you can pick your poison 𝘰𝘳 elixir 😉

      📷: by @ramsesphotovideo @ramses007007

      #DryJanuary #DrinkLocal #LocalLiveMusic #PADHAPS #ThePADLife #HostelLife #HostelEvents #HostelBar #SustainableBar #ABAR #SilverthorneHappyHour #SupportLocalMusicians #Inclusivity

      Open

      What is Drag Trivia?

      Simply put, it is trivia with an added element of entertainment, featuring our lovely host @dr.zackarina who will present five rounds including general trivia, niche topics, picture this, music trivia and final jeopardy to keep you entertained till the last moment!

      It's FREE to play and there are no limits on your group size as long as you all can sit together. Prizes from @lunazultequila + A-BAR for winning teams!

      We are so excited for our first night of this, which will be a regular monthly event every third Wednesday. (We rescheduled last week due to the snow storm.)

      Thanks to @mountain_pride for their support of this event.

      #TriviaNight #DragTrivia #StraightsCanPlayToo #InclusiveEvents #LGBTQFriendly #RepresentationMatters #HostelEvents #HostelLife #PADHAPS #ThePADLife #SilverthorneCO #SummitCountyColorado #MountainPride #PrideAllYear #PrideEveryDay

      Open

      Whether you're an experienced hostelier or new to the scene, we're certain you'll find so many things to love during your stay here.

      "My first Hostel experience… Ill be back! Feels like the future of easy travel just got swanky! Not corporate at all yet tight and upscale. Awesome beds and clean facilities. The Abar lounge was a nice surprise; I especially liked the non alcoholic option of kambucha on tap." -KK

      "This place is amazing! It's everything I love about hostels, minus all the things I don't love about hostels, plus all the things I do love about hotels, minus all the things I don't love about hotels. I had a ton of fun at the Wednesday night trivia and enjoyed getting to use the shared kitchen (which was very clean and nice). I also loved getting to use the shared work spaces." -Bailey

      Rooms are booking up quickly throughout ski season - book your experience now!
      www.ThePADLife.com

      Photo by @theamandaphoto

      #HostelLife #ThePADLife #Hostelier #TravelMore #TravelOften #NewExperiences #TravelExperience #SustainableTravel #CommunityLodging #CommunityVibe #HostelVibe #HostelsAreMoreFun

      Open

      Our Community Yoga every Saturday is so much more than a place to stretch. Our post-flow libations offer a chance for connection, and always kicks the day off with the best vibes ✨

      Join @yogawithcheese this morning from 9-10 before you enjoy complimentary bevs from @houseofvibescoffee, @happyleafkombucha + @crookedstave

      See you soon!

      #SaturdayYoga #CommunityYoga #YogaLove #PADHaps #HostelEvents #HostelLife #ThePADLife #YogaWithAView

      Open

      We hope you got out there for some fresh turns in this recent storm!

      If @i70things got you down, know that we’re here as a solid affordable option that you can utilize to skip the stress and play in the pow.

      We just want you to have fun 💚

      Shoutout to PADvocate @ninerweiner for sharing this badass shot! Tag us in your shred photos, we love to see em 🤩

      Photo cred: @yeti_living

      #ThePADLife #ShredLife #HostelLife #MountainLife #PowParty #PlayAllDay #GetOutside #StayHere #PlayHere #SilverthorneCO #SummitCountyColorado

      Open

      PADHAPS to keep you entertained all week long 💚

      💃 Tuesday Latin Dance Night | 6-10 PM
      🍹 Sangria + Margarita specials | 5-8 PM

      🧠 DRAG Trivia with @dr.zackarina | 1.18 | 7-9 PM | Prizes from A-BAR + Lunazul Tequila

      🎶 Thursday Throwdowns | 1.19 | 4:30-7 PM | Live music with @being.in

      🔵 Live Music Yoga + Women's Circle with @movecreateradiate | Thurs, 1.19 | 5:30-8:30 PM

      👯 @ecstaticdancecolorado + @katdoesalltheyoga + @betweenrealms_ | Fri, 1.20 | 11 AM

      🧘‍♀️ Saturday Yoga with @yogawithcheese | 9-10:15 AM | $15 suggested donation | complimentary libations

      Hope to see you out and about!

      #HostelHappenings #ThePADLife #PADHaps #HostelEvents #EcstaticDance #DragTrivia #BingoNight #LatinDance #LiveMusicYoga #CommunityYoga #WomensCircle #LocalLiveMusic #LatinDance #LatinDanceNight #OpenMic #CommunitySpace #ForThePeople #HostelAreMoreFun #StayWithUs #PartyWithUs #SilverthorneCO

      Open

      Happy snowy Sunday ☃️

      Living in a snow globe is pretty great when you get to cozy up in here after your adventure!

      Book your experience today 💚
      www.ThePADLife.com

      #Snowglobe #SnowySunday #Snowdayz #DogDaysAreOver #MountainLife #HostelLife #ThePADLife

      Open

      Happy sunny Saturday 🌞

      Fill your day with love, light and kindness ✌️

      Bike path mural going strong by @haoleweird, thanks to @silverthornecolorado + @kokonofilter’s installation shining bright through the snow ✨

      Photo by @ramses007007

      #SpreadLove #SpreadKindness #AllI clusive #InclusivityMatters #PADPride #Pride #HostelViews #HostelLife #ThePADLife #Love #LoveIsLove #HappySaturday #SunnySaturday

      Open
